modName: Sticc to Thicc - a UUNP BodySlide preset
summary: You want de sticc... or you want de thicc? You choose.
descriptionHtml:
A good friend, Taoxue, suggested making a BodySlide preset where the 0 weight was 'A cup' and the 100 weight was 'E cup'. So I did just that.

[list=1]
[*][color=#f9cb9c]The [b]0 weight[/b] (Sticc) is very skinny with small legs and arms, pretty flat chested with a small butt. The breasts are slightly wide, have little gravity to them, and are a bit perky.[/color]
[*][color=#f9cb9c]The [b]100 weight[/b] (Thicc) is a little chunky, big legs and arms, wide shoulders, "big ol' melons" for breasts and a large butt. Thicc.[/color]

[/list]
[color=#f4f4f4]You can see comparison in the images. Sometimes I tell the method used to achieve the body. I will do it this time :)[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]Combined these 4 bodies: 7B B-cup, 7B Cleavage, UNPK Bonus, Venus.
[/color]
[i][b][color=#00ff00]>>>with many bodyslide presets you find, only the breasts and butt change size... Mine does not.[/color][/b][/i]
[color=#00ffff][b]Between 0 weight and 100 weight the following sliders are increased or decreased:[/b][/color]
[list]
[*]Legs, Thighs, SlimThighs
[*]AppleCheeks, ChubbyButt, BigButt, ButtShape2, Butt, ButtSmall
[*]Hips, HipBone
[*]Back, Belly, Waist, BigTorso
[*]ShoulderWidth, Arms
[*]NippleLength, NippleSize, NippleAreola
[*]BreastWidth, BreastPerkiness, BreastGravity, Breast Flatness, BreastCleavage, DoubleMelon, BreastFantasy, Breasts, BreastsSmall
[/list][color=#00ffff][b]As you can see, many things change from weight 0 to 100. This creates more variety for the shapes within the spectrum between"Sticc to Thicc".


[/b][/color][b][color=#00ff00][size=4][u]Requirements:[/u][/size][/color][/b]
[list=1]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=2]HDT Physics Extension[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=2]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=2]BodySlide and Outfit Studio[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=2]FNIS[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=2]A UNP Compatible Skin Texture[/size][/color]
[/list]
[u][b][color=#00ff00][size=4]Credits:[/size][/color][/b][/u]
[list=1]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]Taoxue - for the Idea.[/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]Caliente - for the BodySlide program.[/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]Bethesda - for Skyrim.[/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]Nexus - for the site to host my mods.[/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9]Everyone else who made the required mods.[/color]
[/list]
[color=#00ffff][b][i]>>>What outfit am I using? XN String Bikini UUNP[/i][/b][/color]
